tool_description: Trendn aggregates the most viral and socially-shared content on the web. Ranking is based on social engagement, which refers to how interesting or relevant people have found an item or category to be. Examples of engagement include sharing with your friends, bookmarking an article, leaving a comment on a blog, or clicking a link to read a news item.
name: Trendn
title: Trendn

api_list.name: Trending
api_list.url: https://trendn.p.rapidapi.com/trending/all, business, entertainment, fashion, gaming, health, music, politics, science, sports, startups, technology, us, world.json
api_list.description: Returns the most viral and socially-shared content on the web.

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.default: all, business, entertainment, fashion, gaming, health, music, politics, science, sports, startups, technology, us, world
